alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Lincoln; Ouachita; Union; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 10:29PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette, southern Union and southern Columbia Counties, northern Webster, Union, northern Ouachita, Claiborne and northern Lincoln Parishes through 1130 PM CDT... At 1028 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lapile to 6 miles west of Wesson to near Welcome. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, El Dorado, Springhill, Homer, Huttig, Junction City, Swartz, Farmerville, Haynesville, Bernice, Sterlington, Cullen, Sarepta, Strong, Emerson, Shongaloo, Wesson, Atlanta, Urbana and Cooley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Claiborne; Lincoln; Ouachita; Union; Webster
